EaglePage* EaglePageProviderArray_getPage ( EaglePageProviderArray *  epp,
int  pageNumber 
)

Get a random page from a provider.

You may only use this if EaglePageProvider_isRandomAccess() returns EagleTrue.

Parameters:
[in] epp The provider.
[in] pageNumber The number of the page where the first page will be 0.
Returns:
The page, or NULL.

Create a new read only page provider from a fixed size array.

[in] records The data records.

[in] recordsPerPage The amount of records to serve out per page.

00008 {
00009     EaglePageProviderArray *pageProvider = (EaglePageProviderArray*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EaglePageProviderArray_New.1", sizeof(EaglePageProviderArray));
00010     if(NULL == pageProvider) {
00011         return NULL;
00012     }
00013     
00014     pageProvider->providerType = EaglePageProviderTypeArray;
00015     pageProvider->type = type;
00016     pageProvider->name = (NULL == name ? NULL : strdup(name));
00017     pageProvider->recordsPerPage = recordsPerPage;
00018     
00019     pageProvider->offsetRecords = 0;
00020     pageProvider->totalRecords = totalRecords;
00021     pageProvider->records = records;
00022     pageProvider->nextPageLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00023     
00024     return pageProvider;
00025 }
